Welcome to Cairo

Cairo, the vibrant capital of Egypt, is a city steeped in history and culture, offering awe-inspiring landmarks and bustling bazaars.

Top Attractions in Cairo

♥

Pyramids of Giza

One of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, a must-visit in Cairo.

♥

Egyptian Museum

A treasure trove of ancient Egyptian artifacts and mummies.

♥

Khan El Khalili

A bustling market offering traditional crafts and souvenirs.

♥

Al-Azhar Mosque

A stunning mosque and one of the oldest universities in the world.

♥

Coptic Cairo

A historic area with ancient churches and the Hanging Church.
